entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 11:57 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: WSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Snow or rain beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:19 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:19 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:19 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
